title: Pro Bono Legal Support Network Expansion
summary: Major law firms and legal nonprofits establish a centralized pro bono coordination platform to support litigation against institutional overreach. Network includes 42 law firms, connecting 1,200+ attorneys with rapid response capabilities for constitutional defense.
